SamPy.fitting.SplineFittingÂ¶

Example how to spline B-spline to fake data.

requires:Python 2.5 or later (no 3.x compatible)
requires:NumPy
requires:SciPy

TESTED: Python 2.5.1 NumPy: 1.4.0.dev7576 SciPy: 0.7.1 matplotlib 1.0.svn

HISTORY: Created on November 26, 2009

version:0.1: test release (SMN)
author:Sami-Matias Niemi
contact:sniemi@unc.edu

Classes

SplineFitting(xnodes[, spline_order]) Fits a B-spline representation of 1-D curve.
